p: On the other side, the protective role of PSO was confirmed by Ramah et al. [ 49] who found that treatment with PSO markedly alleviated lead acetate induced pathological changes in testes tissues of rats. Phenolic compounds, vitamins and zinc in pumpkin are attributed factors for its antioxidant activity by neutralizing free radical generation [ 50, 51]. In addition, the presence of oleic acid in pumpkin diminishes the ability of the testes and epididymis to lipid peroxidation [ 52].
